subject: Football
Retirement
Franchises
lead_paragraph: Two distinguished Giants, Ike Hilliard and David Tyree, retired after signing one-day contracts with the team. One will be remembered for a consistent career, the other for one big catch.
snippet: Two distinguished Giants, Ike Hilliard and David Tyree, retired after signing one-day contracts with the team. One will be remembered for a consistent career, the other for one big catch.
